law.catch_line: The Department is the agency of this State:...

text.section:
The Department is the agency of this State:
To administer a program of services for children who are crippled or who have conditions that lead to crippling; and
To supervise the administration of the program services that the Department does not provide directly.

The purposes of this program are:
To develop, extend, and improve services for finding these children;
To provide medical, surgical, corrective, and other services and care; and
To provide facilities for diagnosis, hospitalization, and aftercare.
